channel.title: Mountain Pass on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Mountain Pass on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-395 North - Sierra Nevada Pass Information
item.description: Sierra Nevada mountain pass information on US-395 north. This sign shows the status of CA-120 (Tioga Pass), CA-108 (Sonora Pass), and CA-89 (Monitor Pass). At the time this picture was taken, the only pass still closed was Tioga Pass.
